remarks: The value of a function given by an ordered-pair class abstraction is the empty set when the class it would otherwise map to is a proper class.  This version of ~ fvmptn uses bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
fvmptf.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
fvmptf.2 $e |- F/_ x C $.
fvmptf.3 $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
fvmptf.4 $e |- F = ( x e. D |-> B ) $.
fvmptnf $p |- ( -. C e. _V -> ( F ` A ) = (/) ) $.
$d D x $.
